title: Lincoln's WARNING #100003: Economic Recession Warnings
script: Economic Recession Warnings. The headlines scream urgency. Strange how the solutions always require YOUR sacrifice, never THEIRS. Austerity for you. Bonuses for them. The pattern repeats because we keep falling for it. Break the cycle. Bitcoin below. Economic Recession Warnings? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below.
